features.title: Why Gut Health Matters
features.subtitle: Your microbiome affects everything from weight management to energy levels

weight.title: Weight Management
weight.description: Your gut bacteria directly influence how your body stores fat and regulates hunger hormones.

energy.title: Energy & Mood
energy.description: 90% of serotonin is produced in your gut, affecting both energy levels and mental wellbeing.

immunity.title: Immune Support
immunity.description: 70% of your immune system resides in your gut. A healthy microbiome means stronger defenses.

digestion.title: Better Digestion
digestion.description: Reduce bloating, improve nutrient absorption, and support overall digestive comfort.

resetProtocol.title: 14-Day Reset Protocol
resetProtocol.removeList: Added sugars, refined carbs (bread, pasta, rice), seed oils (canola, soybean, corn)
resetProtocol.cookingTip: Never heat olive/avocado oil. Use only coconut oil or ghee for cooking.
resetProtocol.focusList: Non-starchy veggies, quality proteins, healthy fats, berries, bone broth, fermented foods
